name: pjomli
body: |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h)), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h)), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h)), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

comment: Subspace form of orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice. Compare the orthomodular law in Theorem 2(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 22. Derived using projections; compare ~ omlsi . (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
